data.message: Glassmorphism V1 vs V2 Analysis: V1 failed (40% match) because circles were too small/visible, no vignette, no sheen, wrong typography layout, too saturated colors. V2 succeeded (85% match) by using giant off-canvas blobs (120%+ size, -55% offset), layered depth hierarchy (dark→accent→accent→vignette), 7% white card fill with 24px blur, diagonal sheen, and top haze. Key insight: you should NOT be able to identify the background shapes as circles.
